channel.title: Mtv 2 [pi] question marcbob's client
channel.description: Okay it is really important thing i want to remove. When you click on any COMBAT- SKILL you can enter an amount and change the level. Any way to remove it? Im bad at coding [PI]. Help!!!

item.title: Mtv 2 [pi] question marcbob's client
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

ClickingButtons class. (ClickingButtons.java)
Located: (Server) src/server/model/players/packets/
Find the actionButton of each skill, and remove its functions.
Here is a list of the actionButtons:

33206 = Attack!
33207 = Hitpoints!
33208 = Mining!
33209 = Strength!
33210 = Agility!
33211 = Smithing!
33212 = Defence!
33213 = Herblore!
33214 = Fishing!
33215 = Range!
33216 = Theiving!
33217 = Cooking!
33218 = Prayer!
33219 = Crafting!
33220 = Firemaking
33221 = Magic!
33222 = Fletching!
33223 = Woodcutting!
33224 = Runecrafting!
47130 = Slayer!
54104 = Farming!
